CustomField.description: Picklist of fields on Indicator to set the default order of the Indicators Catalog table on ManageIndicators. If left NULL, the Indicators Catalog will sort by alphabetically ascending Definition.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a field from Project Indicator to alphabetically order the Indicators Catalog table on ManageIndicators. If no field is selected, the table will by default be ordered alphabetically by Indicator Definition.
CustomField.label: Indicators Catalog Order
